resources.string: If you would like to scan documents to be saved by the FSSA, please use this kiosk and press the button below to begin.
The scanning process is now complete. All of your documents have been submitted to the FSSA\'s database for safe keeping.
Now that you have submitted your documents, you will be logged out, and a representative will be with you shortly to help you with the next steps. Thank You for using the FSSA Self-Service Kiosk.
